metadata.synopsis: A heterosexual Beijing policeman (Hu Jun) and a young homosexual (Si Han) challenge each other's sexuality.

reviews: Though too verbose and static, it's the first film to deal explicitly with gay life in China, and as such adds a panel to the growing body of movies about sexual politics in rigid societies.
Sua inegvel relevncia poltica e social (especialmente  poca de seu lanamento) infelizmente no se traduz em qualidade narrativa.
Feels like a stage play with two characters in a single room, but the way the story delicately unfolds keeps us gripped.
[Has] a sophistication and haunting complexity that would be the pride of any open Western auteur.
The first mainland Chinese drama to deal openly with the subject of homosexuality.
